attributes.action: ... raise the lower age limit for parliamentary candidates to around 40 or 50 to ensure that all MPs have made their way in the real world before standing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Far too many MPs have never had a job outside politics. Yet from this pool are drawn ministers running major state enterprises.  At least if they have had to make their way before standing it will guarantee a wider spread of experience.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
